name: Vortex Of Pain
description:
Story:
Liberate your city from a cult of simulation theory maniacs obsessed with conserving processing power.

Gameplay:
Vortex of Pain is a beat 'em up game with a focus on physics and using the environment as a weapon. Evasions and throws have a big role in the gameplay compared to most other beat 'em ups. The gameplay is fun and flexible.

A controller is strongly suggested, but keyboard and mouse controls are supported also.

Features:
  • Single player and up to 4 player co-op story mode with adjustable enemy counts
  • Versus mode for 2-4 players
  • 4 difficulty levels
  • Air grapples
  • Evasions
  • Free rotation throws
  • Breakable objects
  • Character specific fighting moves such as Daria's enemy jump and Hironobu's ball roll
  • Crawling
  • Sliding
  • Randomly generated enemy names

Default controls:
A = punch
B = jump
X = special attack
Y = taunt
LB = evade
RB = grapple
LT = run
RT = strong attack
RS = toggle zoom
LS = crawl
A (while running) = slide or roll
RB (while in air) = air grapple
A + left or right (while grappling) = throw
